ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are very grateful for providing and authorizing them to use pictures of Rodgersia sambucifolia Hemsl. by Professor Shaohua Yang (Institute of Alpine Economics and Botany of Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences).
